article.headline: UAB 107, Belmont 76
article.story: BIRMINGHAM, Ala. (AP) -- Donell Taylor and Marvett McDonald scored 19 points each to lead UAB to a 107-76 rout of Belmont on Wednesday night. McDonald hit five 3-pointers as the two teams combined for 27 3s. Ronell Taylor scored 13 points and Demario Eddins had 12 for UAB (5-1). The Blazers finished with 13 3-pointers. Andrew Preston scored 19 points and grabbed seven rebounds to lead Belmont (2-4). Nick Otis came off the bench to score 14 points, while Jese Snyder added 11 points for the Bruins. Otis had four 3-pointers and Snyder and Josh Goodwin hit three each for Belmont. The Bruins finished with 14 3s. UAB led all the way but Belmont pulled with 24-23 midway through the first half. UAB went on a 17-3 run to break the game open, taking a 61-40 lead at halftime. Belmont cut the margin to 10 points early in the final half, but UAB went on a 7-0 spurt to take control.
